page.title: 05CHERTSEY MUSEUM
page.content: We visited Chertsey Museum. There was a Viking sword which was found in 1981. By the sword there was a shield, a spearhead and a dagger. There was a big dolls house with lots of things inside. There were lots of old clocks which were all working. One room was full of pottery and one was full of clothes from the last two hundred years. In the corridor there was a quill pen with a ginger feather. We went out into the garden where there was a grave stone and a rocking elephant which we were allowed to ride on. The Museum is open Tuesday to Saturday in the afternoon. It was a very interesting visit.
